title: Endowed Ambassador Mickey Gardner International Scholars Support Fund
description: To support international activities and engagements of the Silicon Flatirons Center; leverage and build upon relationships developed in partnership with United States Telecommunications Training Institute (USTTI) teaching program.
marketingContent: To support international activities and engagements of the Silicon Flatirons Center; leverage and build upon relationships developed in partnership with United States Telecommunications Training Institute (USTTI) teaching program.
